name: Get All Coin
description:
Hello and welcome to the our gameshow Get All Coin!

Goal of the game is to grab all coins in each round.
However, keep your eye on the Tax Rate, because it keeps climbing every round!
Round only starts when you start moving your Drone, so feel free to look around first.

Game is made in Godot, so exporting to Windows and Linux is easy, just leave a comment if you want that version. Also, I have the code up on GitHub in a private repo, and will make it public if you want.
